abstract: Friendship, great bargains and community spirit. Filmed as part of 'ACMI in the Regions: Stories from Horsham Shire'.
description: Meet the women who volunteer their time to run Horsham’s Op Shops, located in western Victoria. These ladies have been providing years of entertainment and bargains to both locals and visitors, embodying the community spirit of Horsham.
